Noncredit Offerings                                                                   Claim Your Digital NYU School of Professional Studies Noncredit Certificate Badge                                                                        Play                              Noncredit Offerings at the NYU School of Professional Studies        The NYU School of Professional Studies is a leader in noncredit continuing education. People from across the country and around the world enroll in our noncredit courses , certificates , online offerings , and intensives . Professionally oriented programs are offered as well as those geared toward personal enrichment. Day, evening, and weekend schedules are available to fit your busy lifestyle. Courses are taught by top industry professionals, who provide you with the latest information in your area of interest.   No matter what your passion or career path, you will find that the School offers a noncredit learning environment like no other. From Creating Websites for Mobile Devices to Collecting and Appraising Rare Books , there is something for everyone.            Noncredit Certificate Digital Badge     Noncredit Academic Policies and Procedures    Noncredit Information Sessions     Dorothy Durkin Torch Circle Benefits    High School Academy     Intensives    Professional Advantage               Ready to Proceed?     Search for a Course Now       Download Summer 2015 Bulletin          Courses     Noncredit courses can provide the information needed to hone your current skills, learn new ones, or simply enrich your life. Choose from thousands of courses that are offered online and onsite. Many can apply towards earning noncredit certificates .         Certificates     More than 100 noncredit certificates are available from which to choose. These programs are comprised of required courses and elective courses that allow you to tailor your program of study to meet your professional goals.           Online Offerings     The NYU School of Professional Studies offers a large number of online noncredit courses. So, you can learn at home, at work, or on the road. Some courses are offered completely online, while others combine online and onsite instruction.                                                                            Advanced Certificate Search                                                       New Courses     New noncredit courses offered by the School put you on the fast track to success by helping you to acquire new skills and to expand upon existing knowledge. A wide selection of new courses are added throughout the semester.           Explore New Courses       Intensives     Intensive programs offer course content in condensed formats. They run throughout the year, but are most prevalent during the summer months. Programs range from 1-12 weeks and provide total immersion in subject matter.           Learn More About Intensives       Register for Courses     To register for a course, call (212) 998-7150; visit sps.nyu.edu ; or visit us in person at 7 East 12th Street, Room 133, Mon.–Thurs., 9 a.m.–7 p.m.; Fri., until 5 p.m; and Sat.–Sun. 9 a.m.–6 p.m.             Create an Account         Login to Your Account to Register                                               QUICK LINKS                        About Us          Student Affairs          Visit Us          School-wide Policies          Contact Us                       ATTEND THE SCHOOL                        Graduate Admissions          Undergraduate Admissions          Noncredit Registration          High School Academy          Professional Advantage                             ON THE WEB                         On Facebook          On Twitter          On YouTube          Browser Requirements                                                        NYU Homepage   © New York University School of Professional Studies | Privacy Policy

Procedures ›           Bulletin ›           Noncredit Certificate Digital Badge ›           Winter Session ›                        Ready to Proceed?           Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                                      Noncredit Certificates                           If you are seeking a way to move your career forward, consider enrolling in an NYU School of Professional Studies noncredit certificate program. These multiclass offerings are designed to allow you to expand your expertise in a specific subject. They are comprised of required courses that cover the fundamentals of your area of interest, as well as electives that focus on more granular topics of specialization. Course curriculum, is developed by professionals for professionals. Knowledge and skills gained can be immediately applied in the workplace.   Courses are conveniently scheduled to fit the busy lifestyles of working professionals. Certificates provide a valuable credential that enhances your resume in addition to immersing you in relevant dialogue about your industry. As you work towards earning your certificate, you will meet and network with instructors and fellow students who can broaden your knowledge base and serve as invaluable industry contacts.             View All Noncredit Certificates         New Certificates           Accelerated Certificate in International Airline Management        Certificate in 3D Design and Fabrication        Certificate in Conference Interpreting: Chinese/English        Certificate in Data Science with R        Certificate in Interior Design: Intensive                       Ready to Proceed?
